content: readme.md google reportereasily integrate google analytics your ios, macos, tvos app without downloading of google sdks.read why created google reporter hereswift 4/xcode 9 support: please the swift-4 branch.set works carthage just put googlereporter.swift your project. your appdelegate's didfinishlaunchingwithoptions where initialize app. need configure googlereporter ua-xxxxx-xx tracker id.import googlereporter@uiapplicationmainclass appdelegate: uiresponder, uiapplicationdelegate { func application(_ application: uiapplication, didfinishlaunchingwithoptions launchoptions: [uiapplicationlaunchoptionskey: ]?) -> bool { googlereporter.shared.configure(withtrackerid: "ua-xxxxx-xx") return true }}usage can track event wish using event() method the googlereporter. example:func didcompletesignup() { googlereporter.shared.event("authentication", action: "sign completed")} many cases 'll to track "screens" the user navigates . a natural place do is your viewcontrollers viewdidappear. can the screenview() method the googlereporter works same event().class beerviewcontroller: uiviewcontroller { override func viewdidappear(_ animated: bool) { super.viewdidappear(animated)googlereporter.shared.screenview("beer") }}technical notes googlereporter uses native userdefaults.standard store random uuid uniquely identifies user/install. clearing otherwise tampering the userdefaults may cause user identifier be lost the googlereporter generate new unique identifier. googlereporter class is thread-safe. avoid bugs, always the googlereporter.shared accessor the same thread. suggest using main thread. network call log data still happen a background thread.roadmap're planning to add more functionality easily interact the measurement protocol.still be implemented: session tracking;
